info.title: NOMIS Mapping Service
info.description: Manages mapping information between DPS services and NOMIS

put.summary: Creates a new set of adjudication punishment mapping and deletes ones no longer required
put.description: Creates a record of a DPS punishment id and NOMIS bookingId and sanction sequence. The ones that require deleting are removed NOMIS id. Requires NOMIS_ADJUDICATIONS

409.description: One of the punishment mappings already exist

post.summary: Creates a new set of adjudication punishment mapping
post.description: Creates a record of a DPS punishment id and NOMIS bookingId and sanction sequence. Requires NOMIS_ADJUDICATIONS

409.description: One of the punishment mappings already exist

get.description: Get all the mapping table rows. Should only be used in dev (in pre/prod this could return excessive data). Requires role NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

put.description: Updates a mapping between Nomis and Activities, including both the COURSE_ACTIVITY and COURSE_SCHEDULE. Requires NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description: The request is invalid, see response for details

404.description: An activity schedule mapping to update could not be found

post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis id and Activity service id. Requires NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description: Nomis or activity schedule ids already exist

get.summary: get room mappings for a prison
get.description: Retrieves  room mappings associated with a NOMIS prison id. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

post.description: Creates a new room mapping. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

400.description: mapping for this nomis room and prison already exists

post.description: Creates a new visit and decrements the visit balance. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

400.description: Nomis or VSIP ids already exist

409.description: Indicates a duplicate visit has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

delete.summary: Deletes visit id mappings
delete.description: Deletes all rows from the the visit id table. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

parameters.name: onlyMigrated
parameters.description: if true delete mapping entries created by the migration process only (synchronisation records are unaffected)

post.summary: Creates a new sentence adjustment mapping
post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis sentence adjustment ids and Sentencing service id. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_SENTENCING

400.description: Nomis or Sentencing ids already exist

409.description: Indicates a duplicate sentencing adjustment mapping has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

delete.summary: Deletes sentence adjustment mappings
delete.description: Deletes all rows from the the sentence adjustment mapping table. Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING

parameters.name: onlyMigrated
parameters.description: if true delete mapping entries created by the migration process only (synchronisation records are unaffected)

post.description: Creates a mapping between a Nomis non-association and non-association instance id. Requires role NOMIS_NON_ASSOCIATIONS

409.description: Indicates a duplicate non-association has been rejected. If Error code = 409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

delete.summary: Deletes non-association mappings.
delete.description: Deletes all rows from the non-associations mapping table. Requires role NOMIS_NON_ASSOCIATIONS

parameters.name: onlyMigrated
parameters.description: if true delete mapping entries created by the migration process only (synchronisation records are unaffected)

post.description: Creates a mapping between a Nomis location id and a DPS location id. Requires role NOMIS_LOCATIONS

409.description: Indicates a duplicate location has been rejected. If Error code = 409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

delete.summary: Deletes location mappings.
delete.description: Deletes all rows from the locations mapping table. Requires role NOMIS_LOCATIONS

parameters.name: onlyMigrated
parameters.description: if true delete mapping entries created by the migration process only (synchronisation records are unaffected)

post.summary: Creates a new Incident Report mapping
post.description: Creates a mapping between a Nomis incident report id and DPS Incident report id. Requires role NOMIS_INCIDENTS

409.description: Indicates a duplicate incident has been rejected. If Error code = 409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

delete.summary: Deletes incident mappings.
delete.description: Deletes all rows from the incidents mapping table. Requires role NOMIS_INCIDENTS

parameters.name: onlyMigrated
parameters.description: if true delete mapping entries created by the migration process only (synchronisation records are unaffected)

post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis Incentive ids and Incentive service id. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_INCENTIVES

400.description: Nomis or Incentive ids already exist

409.description: Indicates a duplicate incentive has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

delete.summary: Deletes incentive mappings
delete.description: Deletes all rows from the the incentive mapping table. Requires role NOMIS_INCENTIVES

parameters.name: onlyMigrated
parameters.description: if true delete mapping entries created by the migration process only (synchronisation records are unaffected)

post.description: Creates a record of a DPS hearing Id and a NOMIS hearing Id . Requires NOMIS_ADJUDICATIONS

post.summary: Creates a new court case hierarchical mapping
post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis Court Case ID and DPS Court Case ID, plus child Court appearances Requires ROLE_NOMIS_COURT_SENTENCING

409.description: Indicates a duplicate mapping has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

post.summary: Creates a new court appearance mapping
post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis Court appearance ID and DPS Court appearance ID. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_COURT_SENTENCING

409.description: Indicates a duplicate mapping has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

get.description: Get all the mapping table rows. Should only be used in dev (in pre/prod this could return excessive data). Requires role NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis id and Appointment instance id. Requires NOMIS_APPOINTMENTS

400.description: Nomis or appointment instance ids already exist

409.description: Indicates a duplicate incentive has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

post.summary: Creates a new allocation migration mapping
post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis allocation id and Actvities allocation id. Requires NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description: Nomis or activity schedule ids already exist

post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis alert ids and dps alert id. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_ALERTS

409.description: Indicates a duplicate mapping has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

delete.summary: Deletes all alert mappings
delete.description: Deletes all alert mappings regardless of source. This is expected to only ever been used in a non-production environment. Requires ROLE_NOMIS_ALERTS

post.summary: Creates a new adjudication mapping along with associated hearings and punishments
post.description: Creates a record of a adjudication number, hearing and punishment. Requires NOMIS_ADJUDICATIONS

409.description: Adjudication with charge sequence already exist

delete.summary: Delete all adjudication related mapping entries
delete.description: Delete mapping entries created during any migration or synchronisation for adjudications and associated hearings and punishments

get.description: Get all the mapping table rows. Should only be used in dev (in pre/prod this could return excessive data). Requires role NOMIS_ADJUDICATIONS

post.description: Creates a record of a adjudication number. Requires NOMIS_ADJUDICATIONS

409.description: Adjudication with charge sequence already exist

post.summary: Creates a new activity migration mapping
post.description: Creates a mapping between nomis id and up to 2 Activity service ids. Requires NOMIS_ACTIVITIES

400.description: Nomis or activity schedule ids already exist

get.description: Retrieves a room mapping by NOMIS prison id and NOMIS room id. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

404.description: NOMIS room description does not exist in the mapping table for the given prison

get.description: Retrieves a mapping by VSIP id. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

404.description: VSIP id does not exist in mapping table

get.description: Retrieves a mapping by NOMIS id. Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

404.description: NOMIS id does not exist in mapping table

get.summary: get paged mappings by migration id
get.description: Retrieve all mappings of type 'MIGRATED' for the given migration id (identifies a single migration run). Results are paged.

delete.summary: Delete mapping entries for the given migration id
delete.description: Delete mapping entries created during a single migration for visits only

get.summary: get the latest mapping for a migration
get.description: Requires role NOMIS_VISITS

404.description: No mappings found at all for any migration

get.description: Retrieves a mapping by NOMIS id. Requires role ROLE_NOMIS_SENTENCING

404.description: NOMIS sentence adjustment id does not exist in mapping table

409.description: Indicates a duplicate adjustment has been rejected. If Error code = 1409 the body will return a DuplicateErrorResponse

get.summary: get paged mappings by migration id
get.description: Retrieve all mappings of type 'MIGRATED' for the given migration id (identifies a single migration run). Results are paged.

get.summary: get the latest mapping for a migration
get.description: Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING

404.description: No mappings found at all for any migration

get.description: Retrieves a mapping by Sentencing adjustment id (from the sentencing domain). Requires role ROLE_NOMIS_SENTENCING

404.description: sentence adjustment id does not exist in mapping table

delete.summary: Deletes a specific Sentence Adjustment mapping by sentence adjustment Id
delete.description: Deletes the Sentence Adjustment mapping. Requires role NOMIS_SENTENCING

get.description: Retrieves a mapping by DPS punishment id. Requires role NOMIS_ADJUDICATIONS

404.description: Id does not exist in mapping table

404.description: Non association id does not exist in mapping table

delete.description: Deletes the non-association from the mapping table. Requires role NOMIS_NON_ASSOCIATIONS

get.description: Retrieve all mappings of type 'MIGRATED' for the given migration id (identifies a single migration run). Results are paged.

404.description: No mappings found at all for any migration

AdjudicationPunishmentBatchUpdateMapping.description: Batch of Adjudication punishment (aka award) mappings to create and delete

AdjudicationPunishmentNomisIdDto.description: ID of mapping identified by the NOMIS id for an adjudication punishment (aka award) mapping

scheduledInstanceMappings.description: Scheduled instance to course schedule mappings

isOpen.description: open or closed indicator, default is false

whenCreated.description: Date time the mapping was created

VisitMappingDto.description: NOMIS to VSIP Visit Id mapping

whenCreated.description: Date time the mapping was created

AdjudicationPunishmentBatchMappingDto.description: Batch of Adjudication punishment (aka award) mappings

NonAssociationMappingDto.description: Non-association mapping (same value for NOMIS and DPS)

LocationMappingDto.description: Location mapping (same value for NOMIS and DPS)

IncidentMappingDto.description: Incident mapping (same value for NOMIS and DPS)

whenCreated.description: Date time the mapping was created

AdjudicationMappingDto.description: Adjudication mapping (same value for NOMIS and DPS)

whenCreated.description: Date time the mapping was created

AdjudicationAllMappingDto.description: Adjudication mapping for all entities in an adjudication
